page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: Most of the land is rough grazing.There were 6 farms,none had cattle grazing on the land.One farm house was used by a farmer,the rest being residential homes. There were also 3 working quarries,all moderatlt small.There was also disused gravel pit, used for fishing now. There were not many houses ,just a few 1950's semi's and some old weaver's houses.These houses were built of 3 floors.The second & third floors were used like a normal house,but the first floor was used as a special workroom.The weavers making all their cloth here.These houses were built before the expansion of the Cotton industry in this area.
